product_name: Pepper's Bewitched Polarized Floater Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: Staying afloat even if you don't, the Pepper's Bewitched Polarized Floater Sunglasses won't sink in water if they fall off your face or the boat. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Triacetate lens construction sandwiches a polyvinyl acetate layer between 2 outer acetate layers. Grilamid nylon frames resist impact and allow sunglasses to float in the water.
short_description: Staying afloat even if you don't, the Pepper's Bewitched Polarized Floater Sunglasses won't sink in water if they fall off your face or the boat.
